author: Special Correspondent
text:
Forest officials on Friday arrested a R. Lakshmanan (49) of Lovedale in The Nilgiris on the charge of setting up snare traps in forest areas which resulted in a leopard getting injured.

The accused is said to have set up snare traps along the forest boundary in Lovedale to catch wild boar. On March 1, a leopard got trapped in the snare. In its battle to get released, it sustained injuries.
title: TAMIL NADU
